description: Core template for AI-native interpretation of baccarat pattern structure. (TYPE_7 removed, Subtypes 1.1–1.6 added to TYPE_1)

pattern_model.tie_handling: T is suffix-only, never initiates a new sequence

core_types.name: Balanced Pairing
core_types.pattern_logic: Equal streaks, alternating. Length n:n (e.g. BB:PP)

core_types.name: Cutpoint-1
core_types.trigger_condition: streak(B or P) >= 2 followed by 1 of opposite

core_types.name: Cutpoint-2
core_types.trigger_condition: streak(B or P) >= 3 followed by 2 of opposite

core_types.name: Cutpoint-3
core_types.trigger_condition: streak(B or P) >= 4 followed by 3 of opposite

core_types.name: Cutpoint-4
core_types.trigger_condition: streak(B or P) >= 5 followed by 4 of opposite

core_types.name: Cutpoint-5
core_types.trigger_condition: streak(B or P) >= 6 followed by 5 of opposite

tie_rules.note: Ties do not break streaks and are not part of pattern triggers.

evaluation_engine.parser_logic: Group streaks by symbol (B/P), ignore T as break
evaluation_engine.row_mode: Start new row only when streak side changes
evaluation_engine.prediction_strategy: Pattern category determines momentum, triggers next-step suggestion
